# Name
Carly Ramacher

## Biography
I am a seasona technician in the Aquatics lab at the Jones Center. Prior to this position I was an undergraduae studying Environmental Biology at Washington University in St. Louis. I also worked at the school's field station, Tyson Research Center, as a field technician censusing trees.

## Favorite field site
Tyson Research Center in Newton, Georgia
